title: Episode 20: Ben Pospisil
description:
On today's episode, Kailey sits down with her good friend, Ben Pospisil, who shares an incredibly powerful testimony of God's redemption in his life. This is a story of hope and truth, showing us that no one is ever too far  gone to be used by God the grace of God.


Thank you to our partners!

StoryWorth: For a limited time, you can save $10 on your first purchase when you go to https://bit.ly/CWKStoryWorth   

Modern Fertility: Get $20 off your at-home fertility test when you go to ModernFertility.com/kailey or visit https://bit.ly/CWKModernFertility
